Detailed Description

cvmx_sriomaint::_ir_sp_rx_stat

This register is used to monitor the reception of packets using the soft packet FIFO. The hardware sets SRIO_INT_REG[SOFT_RX] every time a packet arrives in the soft packet FIFO. To read out (one or more) packets, the following procedure may be best:

(1) clear SRIO_INT_REG[SOFT_RX],

(2) read this CSR to determine how many packets there are,

(3) read the packets out (via SRIOMAINT()_IR_SP_RX_DATA).

This procedure could lead to situations where SOFT_RX will be set even though there are currently no packets the software interrupt handler would need to properly handle this case
